short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks social media content based on time limits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple social media blocker that removes images and videos on a social media site. You can specify the sites and time limits. This is a more creative way to deter endless scrolling on social media, which could be more effective in helping you be more aware of your auto pilot actions.
